title: New League of Legends Ranked lp gain system or tweaks
body:
Hey guys I had an idea about say the season 5 lp gain system.
It is just a thought but for season 5 if they introduced a lp multiplier system, 

So this is how it will go:

You start off with 5 Lp which is the base for both winning and losing.

Secondly you get a positive and negative multiplier which is determined by the current streak you have whether it be a win or lose streak eg. ( 5 win streak would be 5 x positive 5 therefore a positive lp gain of 25 lp for that given game and vice versa for a lose )

Thirdly a cap of 10 times multiplier on both positive and negative. so max lp gain on a max multiplier would be 50lp per game. Where as for losing max lp lose would be 50 per game.

Fourthly putting a time limit on the multipliers and some form of restrictions i guess. Multipliers for winning will degrade 1 multiplier a day however upon losing you will lose all your multiplier stacks but for that losing game your lp lose will be zero (can be abused still thinking on what i could come up with) . Multiplier for losing will also degrade 1 multiplier a day however upon winning you will reduce your multiplier by two per win.

The fifth idea which I am still debating on whether it is an extreme or not, is mainly focused towards trolls, afkers and what not. So upon reaching a 10 lose multiplier your base lp lose is increased from 5 to 10 eg. 100 lp lose on a single lose after obtaining 10 times multiplier, this will mean you getting demoted a division each lose (great for people wanting to get to bronze 5 quick)

The series from division to division and from tier to tier will still remain. ( Challenger and master tier players will maintain a low lp gain per win and same for a lose.Tier demotion remains slightly the same if your 5 or above 5 on the negative multiplier you have no immunity to demotions.

I still have some more ideas that I sorta forgot while i was writing this but comment on the validity, if it is practical or not, what things need to change whether or not the numbers are extreme same with the rewards and punishments.

I took note from what people said about not being in the tier they are meant to be, weird team mates, and the infamous I want to have fun....... go play a dam normal. I guess it will put a more serious feel to ranked games with hopefully less likely hood of non rank worthy players and potentially increase the use of normal games to test out your adc maokai rather than my promos please.

Lastly the slow decay on multipliers are therefore people mostly that lose and keep playing to lose constantly it provides restraint and maybe help them make better judgements. if you lose two games chances are your gonna lose your next one so why not take a break. But however it does fuel the addicts to keep playing cause they do not want to lose their multipliers. so a win win xD

Also i forgot to mention the decay goes to 0 multiplier. But for a win you will receive 5lp cause its not times zero cause thats zero and I dn't want zero lp.

Hopefully the serious feel does not make everyone toxic when they are behind in game cause it will defy the purpose but yea.

So please leave a comment and tell me what you think about the idea for a change in the season 5 rank system.

replies.body: Sounds amazing, even though I rarely play ranked at all. I would finally understand the lp gains and losses. Thankyou for providing some clarity, should this go ahead next season.

Cheers for the Feed back man,

Sadly not enough people liked the idea so its not going to go through, be very appreciated if you could bump the post as well.  
The system was too focused on making the server competitive and demolishing all the negative players also you need a balance  so that is why it wont go through
